BackupSpec.description: Pydantic model for the backup specification details.

include-namespaces.description: List of namespaces to include in the backup (None means all namespaces).
include-namespaces.title: Included Namespaces

include-resources.description: List of resource kinds to include (None means all resource types).
include-resources.title: Included Resources

exclude-namespaces.description: List of namespaces to exclude from the backup.
exclude-namespaces.title: Excluded Namespaces

exclude-resources.description: List of resource kinds to exclude from the backup.
exclude-resources.title: Excluded Resources

include-cluster-resources.description: Whether to include cluster-scoped resources in the backup.
include-cluster-resources.title: Include Cluster Resources

label-selector.description: Label selector to filter resources for backup (e.g. {'app': 'kubeflow'}).
label-selector.title: Label Selector

ttl.description: Optional TTL (time-to-live) for the backup (e.g. '72h' or '30d').
ttl.title: Backup TTL

BackupSpec.title: BackupSpec

app.description: Name of the client application requesting backup.
app.title: Client Application Name

endpoint.description: Name of the relation endpoint on the client providing this spec.
endpoint.title: Client Relation Endpoint
